original_title: Island-Wide Traffic Operation Targets Drug Trafficking
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); In a major crackdown on drug trafficking, the Sri Lankan Police will launch a special week-long traffic operation starting today, covering all police divisions across the island.
This initiative is part of Operation Yukthiya that aims to disrupt drug distribution networks and enhance public safety.
Myanmar has agreed to rescue the 56 Sri Lankans held against their will at a Cyber Slave Camp in Myawaddi by conducting an immediate operation
